Who: CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, NIGHTRAZOR, Hydras, Darkhawk
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room


> "By the pit"cursed Hydras and looking trought the presents"BRING NIGHTLIgHT
> AND CONTAIN THE ENEMIE!!!! THIS TIME KILL EVERY AUTOBOT OR mAXIMAL THAT ARE
> INSIDE THE BASE, WITH THE EXCEPTION OF NIGHLIGHT, KILL EVERY ONE!!!"

Cyclonus nodded as he opened the Predacon communication system,
"Predacons, elimiante all the Autobots and Maximals!" Cyclonus said,
"Coordinate with me. Jhiaxus, keep a fix on all the Predacons and
Decepticons here, keep us aprised of their locations, and we will hunt
down each one."

"Of course." came Jhiaxus' reply.

"Scourge." Cyclonus said switching thought, "You will head up the
search in your sector take Scorponok with you and begin a grid by grid
search. Do not let any Maximal or Autobot escape alive."

"On it." Came Scourge's reply, follwed quickly by an acknowedgement
from Scorponok.

"Perceptor, Darkhawk, what are your locations?" Cyclonus called.

As Cyclonus waited for an answer he turned to Hydras, "Sir, I believe
that these soldiers here will be of use in helping us track down the
Maximals." Cyclonus said gesturing to Deepstryke, Phobia and
Nightrazor, the allies Cyclonus had brought in, "Do I have your
permission to give them access to the base assist us?"

(TAG)

Preston
